name: faithlessly
content:
faithlessly adverb
(NOT LOYAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not sexually loyal to your marriage partner or usual sexual partner: Women can behave as faithlessly and selfishly as men. He faithlessly went home with another woman.
in a way that shows someone is not loyal and cannot be trusted: They had faithlessly broken the terms they agreed to.
More examplesFewer examplesAfter politics drove them apart, he faithlessly married someone else.He has faithlessly sabotaged everything we worked for.He faithlessly signed a five-year contract before shooting the pilot.

in a way that is without religious faith: If we act without mercy to one another, we act faithlessly. See
faithless
More examplesFewer examplesIf we faithlessly discard situation after situation, we will have no place for God in our life.Feeling like we won't be able to resist sin's allure, we faithlessly bow to its demands.He wandered faithlessly in a desert of unbelief.
